TextView.android:text:
★Very Short Question
1) Define algorithm and pseudocode?
2) Differentiate between JVM AND JRE AND JDK?
3) what is class? How can we create object of it.
4) Why multiple inheritance is not using in java?
5) List out all the features of java?
6) what do you mean by visual programming?
7) Identify the term IDE and it’s uses?
★Short questions
1) Differentiate between while, do-while and for loop with example?
2) Write a java program to evolve the grading system of class 11’t’ as per obtained mark?
3) How to create and import package in java? Explain with respective programming?
4) Develop a program to read and write using I/O stream?
5) Explain above methods and events in visual programming?
6) Write the concept of .NET framework with neat diagram?
★Long Question
1) What is applet? Explain the life cycle of an applet and write down the steps involved for embedding applet to html file?
2) Develop database connecting program using ADAPTER, COMMAN and READER?
